info.headline: Flood Warning issued October 27 at 1:51AM EDT until October 27 at 7:00AM EDT by NWS Melbourne FL
info.description:
* WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is occurring.
* WHERE...A portion of east central Florida, including the following county, Brevard.
* WHEN...Until 700 AM EDT.
* IMPACTS...Flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations is imminent or occurring. Numerous roads remain closed due to flooding. It will take several hours for all the water from these storms to work through local drainage systems in urban areas.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 150 AM EDT, local law enforcement reported flooding in the warned area. Flooding flooding impacts will continue over the next several hours. Between 10 and 15 inches of rain have fallen. - Flooding impacts will continue, but no additional rainfall is expected. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Titusville, Rockledge, Cocoa, Cape Canaveral, Titusville Airport, Port Saint John, Sharpes, Mims, Merritt Island, Merritt Island Wildlife Refuge, Bellwood and Lagrange. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction:
Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding.
Stay away or be swept away. River banks and culverts can become unstable and unsafe.
Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely.

parameter.value: FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM EDT THIS MORNING
